ComicInfo.Summary:
Red Sonja escorts a servant of the Goddess to her next mission.
Gordrak recounts the tale of how he and Sonja defeated the demon's mount and captured the demon's ruby.
ComicInfo.Title: Double-Edged; Legends of Red Sonja; The Undefeated
ComicInfo.Writer: Gail Simone,Meljean Brook,Tamora Pierce,Tamora Pierce,Gail Simone,Meljean Brook
